attributes.action: Have more Police patrolling the streets after deaths like Kodjo Yenga
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need more Police patrolling the streets of the UK, I was going to put just London then I thought actually most places have got worse. Deaths like that of Kodjo Yenga in Broad Daylight in the Hammersmith area are so upsetting and I feel for his family,bless them. No more deaths on the streets, we need more protection. The youths involved were as young as 13, something needs to be done.Also make sure the police on the street are adequately protected too against these groups.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
